column4: Hi folks, having trouble setting up my Apache Webserver using Webmin. Am a complete noob at servers
dedicated box install, VM, ?
/var/www/ is the root, so if webmin isn't APT installable, you'd have to put its' files in there to access it from another box
I've done that.
checked /etc/apache2/ blah blah... sites-enabled ?
one sec lemme SSH into my web server
/etc/apache2/sites-enabled/000-default
will see what my file says
might be worth a...
just checked /etc/apache2/sites-enabled/000-default and there's nothing there
literally empty?
yup
how do I configure it? There's another file, webmin.(lotsanumbers).conf that seems to be from the virtual server I tried to add
<VirtualHost *:*>
lol use pastebin.ubuntu.com
thanks
just paste in the link it gave you
Thanks. Here's what's in the webmin.conf file: http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/504226/
hmm, have you tried restarting apache since you installed webmin? i've never used it before to be honest
yeah, no luck.
thanks for trying to help, I'll have a go elsewhere. Cheers.
no problem, gl! i'd imagine that 'site' isn't enabled properly in the config
